author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
China is rapidly expanding its nuclear arsenal—and a new Pentagon report reveals just how serious it’s getting.

According to U.S. officials, the Chinese Communist Party has likely loaded more than 100 intercontinental ballistic missiles into newly built missile silos near China’s northern border. These nuclear-capable weapons can reach the United States and threaten U.S. allies across the Pacific, including Japan and South Korea.

At the same time, China is refusing to engage in arms control or denuclearization talks, despite warnings that its nuclear stockpile could exceed 1,000 warheads by 2030. This comes amid repeated nuclear threats against Japan, rising tensions over Taiwan, and growing fears that the CCP is preparing for a major regional—or even global—conflict.

title: We Should Have Stopped This
